title: Murat Khrachev
text:
Murat Petrovich Khrachev (; born July 25, 1983 in <a href="Cherkessk">Cherkessk</a>, <a href="Karachayevo-Cherkesskaya">Karachayevo-Cherkesskaya</a>) is a Russian <a href="boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the men's lightweight division (– 60 kg) at the <a href="2004%20Summer%20Olympics">2004 Summer Olympics</a> and won the bronze medal.
Khrachev qualified for the <a href="2004%20Summer%20Olympics">2004 Summer Olympics</a> by ending up in first place at the <a href="4th%20AIBA%20European%202004%20Olympic%20Qualifying%20Tournament">4th AIBA European 2004 Olympic Qualifying Tournament</a> in <a href="Baku%2C%20Azerbaijan">Baku, Azerbaijan</a>. In 2005 he was part of the <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n team that won the 2005 <a href="Boxing%20World%20Cup">Boxing World Cup</a>.
